verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> heard יִתְר֨וֹ <WH3503> When Jethro כֹהֵ֤ן <WH3548> the priest מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> of Midian חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses' אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> had done אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of all that God לְמֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> for Moses וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and for Israel עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how הוֹצִ֧יא <WH3318> had brought יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [and] that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> took יִתְרוֹ֙ <WH3503> Then Jethro חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses' אֶת־ <WH853> צִפֹּרָ֖ה <WH6855> Zipporah אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses' אַחַ֖ר <WH310> after שִׁלּוּחֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7964> he had sent her back

וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> And her two בָנֶ֑יהָ <WH1121> sons אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> of whom שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> of which the name הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> of the one גֵּֽרְשֹׁ֔ם <WH1647> [was] Gershom כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> for he said גֵּ֣ר <WH1616> I have been an alien הָיִ֔יתִי <WH1961> have been בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> land נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> in a strange

וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> And the name הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> of the other אֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <WH461> [was] Eliezer כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> for the God אָבִי֙ <WH1> of my father בְּעֶזְרִ֔י <WH5828> [said he was] mine help וַיַּצִּלֵ֖נִי <WH5337> and delivered מֵחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> me from the sword פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> of Pharaoh

וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> came יִתְר֨וֹ <WH3503> And Jethro חֹתֵ֥ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Moses' וּבָנָ֥יו <WH1121> with his sons וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> and his wife אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֶל־ <WH413> in הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> into the wilderness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ה֛וּא <WH1931> he חֹנֶ֥ה <WH2583> where he encamped שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> at הַ֥ר <WH2022> at the mount הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I חֹתֶנְךָ֥ <WH2859> I thy father in law יִתְר֖וֹ <WH3503> Jethro בָּ֣א <WH935> am come אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you וְאִ֨שְׁתְּךָ֔ <WH802> unto thee and thy wife וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and her two בָנֶ֖יהָ <WH1121> sons עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> went out מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> to meet חֹֽתְנ֗וֹ <WH2859> his father in law וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> and did obeisance וַיִּשַּׁק־ <WH5401> and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיִּשְׁאֲל֥וּ <WH7592> him and they asked אִישׁ־ <WH376> each לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> other לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> of [their] welfare וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they came הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <WH168> into the tent

וַיְסַפֵּ֤ר <WH5608> told מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses לְחֹ֣תְנ֔וֹ <WH2859> his father in law אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> had done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> all that the LORD לְפַרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וּלְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> and to the Egyptians עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אוֹדֹ֣ת <WH182> sake יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> for Israel's אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתְּלָאָה֙ <WH8513> [and] all the travail אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that מְצָאָ֣תַם <WH4672> that had come בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> upon them by the way וַיַּצִּלֵ֖ם <WH5337> delivered יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and [how] the LORD

וַיִּ֣חַדְּ <WH2302> rejoiced יִתְר֔וֹ <WH3503> And Jethro עַ֚ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> for all the goodness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> had done יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> to Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִצִּיל֖וֹ <WH5337> whom he had delivered מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> out of the hand מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said יִתְרוֹ֒ <WH3503> And Jethro בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הִצִּ֥יל <WH5337> who hath delivered אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> you out of the hand מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וּמִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> and out of the hand פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הִצִּיל֙ <WH5337> who hath delivered אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under יַד־ <WH3027> from under the hand מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian

עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> Now I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed גָד֥וֹל <WH1419> [is] greater יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> than all gods כִּ֣י <WH3588> indeed בַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> for in the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when זָד֖וּ <WH2102> wherein they dealt proudly עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took יִתְר֨וֹ <WH3503> And Jethro חֹתֵ֥ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Moses' עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> a burnt offering וּזְבָחִ֖ים <WH2077> and sacrifices לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> for God וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> and Aaron וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> to eat לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> bread עִם־ <WH5973> in חֹתֵ֥ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> with Moses' לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> sat מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> that Moses לִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> to judge אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> stood הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people עַל־ <WH5921> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> by Moses מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> from the morning עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> unto the evening

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> saw חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And when Moses' אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ה֥וּא <WH1931> he עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> all that he did לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> to the people וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> he said מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> What [is] this thing הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you עֹשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> that thou doest לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> thou thyself alone and all the people מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> how אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> sit לְבַדֶּ֔ךָ <WH910> alone וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> stand עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> about מִן־ <WH4480> from בֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> by thee from morning עַד־ <WH5704> until עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> day

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses לְחֹתְנ֑וֹ <WH2859> unto his father in law כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יָבֹ֥א <WH935> come אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> Because the people לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> unto me to enquire אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> have לָהֶ֤ם דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> When they have a matter בָּ֣א <WH935> they come אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וְשָׁ֣פַטְתִּ֔י <WH8199> unto me and I judge בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> between one וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> and another וְהוֹדַעְתִּ֛י <WH3045> and I do make [them] know אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֵּ֥י <WH2706> the statutes הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God וְאֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרֹתָֽיו׃ <WH8451> and his laws

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> said חֹתֵ֥ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses' אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about לֹא־ <WH3808> is not טוֹב֙ <WH2896> [is] not good הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> unto him The thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that thou doest

נָבֹ֣ל <WH5034> Thou wilt surely תִּבֹּ֔ל <WH5034> wear away גַּם־ <WH1571> both אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> yourself גַּם־ <WH1571> both הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> both thou and this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> and these אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָבֵ֤ד <WH3515> [is] too heavy מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> is too הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> that [is] with thee for this thing לֹא־ <WH3808> not תוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> for thee thou art not able עֲשֹׂ֖הוּ <WH6213> to perform לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH910> alone

עַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Hearken בְּקֹלִי֙ <WH6963> now unto my voice אִיעָ֣צְךָ֔ <WH3289> I will give thee counsel וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> shall be אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with הֱיֵ֧ה <WH1961> become אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you לָעָ֗ם <WH5971> with thee Be thou for the people מ֚וּל <WH4136> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto God וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <WH935> that thou mayest bring אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> the causes אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֣ה <WH2094> teach אֶתְהֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> them ordinances וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרֹ֑ת <WH8451> and laws וְהוֹדַעְתָּ֣ <WH3045> and shalt shew לָהֶ֗ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> them the way יֵ֣לְכוּ <WH1980> walk בָ֔הּ וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH4639> and the work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they יַעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> that they must do

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you תֶחֱזֶ֣ה <WH2372> Moreover thou shalt provide מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָ֠עָם <WH5971> out of all the people אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men חַ֜יִל <WH2428> able יִרְאֵ֧י <WH3373> such as fear אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> men אֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> of truth שֹׂ֣נְאֵי <WH8130> hating בָ֑צַע <WH1215> covetousness וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> and place עֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH5921> over שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> [such] over them [to be] rulers אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> of thousands שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> [and] rulers מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> of hundreds שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> rulers חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> of fifties וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and rulers עֲשָׂרֹֽת׃ <WH6235> of tens

וְשָׁפְט֣וּ <WH8199> And let them judge אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֮ <WH5971> the people בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵת֒ <WH6256> at all seasons וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> it be that כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> matter הַגָּדֹל֙ <WH1419> and it shall be [that] every great יָבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> they shall bring אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you וְכָל־ <WH3605> every הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> matter הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> unto thee but every small יִשְׁפְּטוּ־ <WH8199> they shall judge הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like וְהָקֵל֙ <WH7043> so shall it be easier מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and they וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> for thyself and they shall bear אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

אִ֣ם <WH518> If אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> If thou shalt do וְצִוְּךָ֣ <WH6680> command אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and God וְיָֽכָלְתָּ֖ <WH3201> thee [so] then thou shalt be able עֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> to endure וְגַם֙ <WH1571> also כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> and all this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> these עַל־ <WH5921> unto מְקֹמ֖וֹ <WH4725> to their place יָבֹ֥א <WH935> shall also go בְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> So Moses לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice חֹתְנ֑וֹ <WH2859> of his father in law וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> and did כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he אָמָֽר׃ <WH559> all that he had said

וַיִּבְחַ֨ר <WH977> chose מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> men חַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> able מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> out of all Israel וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and made אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> רָאשִׁ֖ים <WH7218> them heads עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> over the people שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> rulers אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> of thousands שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> rulers מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> of hundreds שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> rulers חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> of fifties וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and rulers עֲשָׂרֹֽת׃ <WH6235> of tens

וְשָׁפְט֥וּ <WH8199> And they judged אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֑ת <WH6256> at all seasons אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> causes הַקָּשֶׁה֙ <WH7186> the hard יְבִיא֣וּן <WH935> they brought אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְכָל־ <WH3605> every הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> dispute הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> but every small יִשְׁפּוּט֥וּ <WH8199> they judged הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> depart מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> חֹתְנ֑וֹ <WH2859> let his father in law וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went ל֖וֹ אֶל־ <WH413> about אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> his way into his own land פ
